attributes.action: change the job title of those elected to Parliament from Member of Parliament to People's Representative in Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent expenses scandal has shown that those elected to Parliament believe themselves to be part of an elite club rather than representatives of the people who elected them.  To remind them of their place their job title should be changed from Member of Parliament to Peoples Representative in Parliament

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
